events.details: The great work of 50 #NSS volunteers of Banari Amman Technical College! On Engineer's Day, Team in Bhavani Sagar area removal of flexible and glass waste. @BctTrust and Sathyamangalam Tigers ensure support of shelter forest department and safety of volunteers #NSS üëèüåø #NSS Encourages Teamwork between Volunteers, @BctTrust, Forest Officers. Together, they've made a significant impact on local cleanliness. üôåüíö. Thank you so much to all who involved in this important effort! Let's continue to work together to keep our environment clean and protect the natural beauty of our surroundings. üåçüå±

'Around 40 students of the country welfare scheme volunteers of Banari Amman College went to a government school in Periya Karattupalayam. There students from 1st to 5th grade educated them with some ideas and testimonies about school regulations and advancing through education in life. School Principal and School Teachers concluded their speech by thanking the teachers and students of the National Welfare Committee.

About 100 students and teachers of Bannari Amman Technical College of Erode district, Tamil Nadu Forest Department, Sathyamangalam Tigers Protection Forest Officers and Volunteers of BIO DIVERSITY CONSERVATION TRUST (BCT) on 24.08.23, Angalwadi in Hassanur to be filled with elephants and wildlife Glass bottles in the area and flexible Cleaned corn garbage with appropriate protective equipment and dispose of it in a great manner. Forest officials and BCT volunteers of Bin Tigers Shelter together concluded this event in a great manner by raising awareness among the students about the steps we need to take to build a green Tamil Nadu, weed-tree removal of forest, lifestyles of elephants and foods etc. It was notable that those who were there throughout the event were safe and supportive of the elephant and other wildlife.

On last 26/6/23, all NSS Volunteers in India conducted a simultaneous rally from 9.30 am to 10:30 am on the occasion of International Drug Trafficking Day, will be selected as a world record. BIT based NSS Volunteers, Awareness under the guidance of Prof Sadasivam and Prof Vanitha to avoid drugs to people with our student friends at Sathiamangala Bus Stand We conducted the rally successfully.

On last 15.05.2023, help was needed for hundi thinking at Vana Bhadrakaliamman temple located in Mettupalayam. Our #NSS volunteers fulfilled the requirements, counting money, retail and stacked the event perfectly.
Our #NSS Volunteers conducted the crowd in a great manner and helped to make the event better without any hassle during the Dance Nation at our Bannari Amman Technical College.

Our #NSS_UNIT2 guides and volunteers went in person and expressed their thanks to the doctors and Aadhaar service assistants who helped and supported the Medical & Evidence Renewal Camp held by our #NSS Volunteers at Totti, Ramabayalur..

Our #NSS Volunteers landed with police officers in an attempt to control the crowd at Bannari Amman Temple Gundam Festival as per their advisory, and conducted the crowd in an excellent manner without day and night.

Our #NSS volunteers visited the people of the tank where the seven-day camp was held and collected information about the problems, needs of the people there and then conducted a survey to advise women and uneducated students.
Our #NSS Volunteers visited Vanapathrakaliamman Temple in Mettupalayam and removed elastic, stones, and unwanted items. Also, they removed weeds and cleaned the surroundings of the temple.

A memorial photograph of our #NSS team's Development of Rural People event in front of Revived Totti Elementary School as a result of the overwhelming effort, hard work and focus of our #NSS volunteers. Here are some pictures of the step-by-step progress and transformation of Revived Tank School as a result of the attention, care and hard work of our #NSS volunteers.

Day 7 (23.03.2023): As the school renovation works were completed, our #NSS volunteers decorated the school and its campus, then invited the public to share the importance of school, education among them. To highlight the event, Principal of Banari Amman College, Guiding Teachers and Mrs. Bhuvaneshwari Subramani (AWS AMBASSADOR) came as special guests and shared their views among the people of the event and made the event special. While renovation work of Totti school was completed, some of our #NSS volunteers held competitions to Ramabayalur school students and encouraged them by distributing prizes to the winners. Our #NSS volunteers planted saplings around the school campus to decorate it more, to create a better environment as the school was innovation.

Day 6 (22.03.2023): While the final renewal works were underway, some of our volunteers shared awareness about Women's Rights and Empowerment among the people of Ramabayalur.As the primary school renovation works near its final phase, fence installation and final clean up around the school campus #NSS volunteers.
events.subheading: Seven Day Camp- Women's Rights and Empowerment

events.details: Day 5 (21.03.2023): #NSS volunteers continue their school renewal work, informed people about mobile phone awareness and Aadhaar renewal camp and conducted it.Day 5 (21.03.2023): #NSS volunteers continue their school renewal work, informed people about mobile phone awareness and Aadhaar renewal camp and conducted it. Emergency numbers and importance of mobile phones were addressed among people at Mobile Awareness Camp.
Day-4 (20.03.2023): #NSS Volunteers trained school students on 'Adult Education Movement, New Bharat Rising Plan' and Digital Literacy Painting walls and laying foundation for fence continues..
events.subheading: Seven Day Camp- Adult Education Movement, New Bharat Rising Plan

events.details: DAY-3(19.03.2023): Self-employment and entrepreneurship camps, basic electrical maintenance training were conducted and our volunteers are changing the school's appearance by painting the school walls and laying foundation for the outdoor fence.

Day-2 (18.03.2023): Medical camp organized in Ramabayalur. #NSS team emphasizes the importance of going doorstep and conducting medical checkup. Cleaning of the school campus continued, pipe maintenance works undertaken and foundation dug for backyard fence.

Day-1 (17.03.2023): A special camp was conducted in Totti village, 42 volunteers and 2 #NSS officers started their journey towards service. Cleaning and maintaining school campus, yoga training provided to school students.

events.flink: Volunteers from #NSS provided training on basic computer skills to students who are studying sixth to ninth standard at Govt Model Higher Secondary School, Sathyamangalam, Malayadipudur.
events.subheading: Training on Basic Computer Skills and Cleanliness Drive

events.details: International Day for Women and Women in Science Department was celebrated at Sadhumugai Panchayat Middle School, Sathyamangalam, on behalf of volunteers.
events.subheading: Celebration of International Day for Women and Women in Science

events.details: The NSS UNIT II of BIT has organized I st year inauguration ceremony on 21.01.2023.We are extremely delighted to welcome our 1st year volunteers to our NSS family.
Congratulations to the #NSS volunteers who successfully conducted the #ConservationDay event at Panchayat Union Middle School, Pungar.
On the birthday of Sardar Vallabhai Patel, our #NSS volunteers pledged to preserve the unity and integrity of our great nation.

Our NSS family headed towards the village to light up hopes among the people of Amhara. The people were briefly introduced about the function of NSS and how it would help them in moving forward towards a bright tomorrow.
